game.name: Baron
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Baron is Turkey's first RPG Themed, Open World Mafia game. Growing up in the seediest underworld, Alparslan vows to fight all his enemies until he becomes the most respected bully in Ankara. An action game with a Deep State Mafia storyline set in Ankara from a TPS perspective.
